document_data.name: Morel
document_data.mainbody: '''Morels''' were edible [[fungi]] found in many locations across [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Availability: Morels grew in abundance in humid temperate ares of [[Thay]] beyond the [[Second Escarpment]].
document_data.Usages:
*In [[Waterdeep]], [[roasted cockatrice]] was served with morels or [[nightcap]] mushrooms.
*The fanciful [[Eel Revealed]] eatery in the [[Cormyr]]ean capital city of [[Suzail]] served platters full of succulent [[eel]]s and morels dosed with [[sardragon sauce]].
*The [[Platter of Plenty]] tavern in [[Marsember]] served its famous [[Blentra's Oysters and Wild Rice in Mushroom Soup]] that contained three fistfuls of morels per [[cauldron]].
*In [[Stag Steads]] of the [[King's Forest]], morels accompanied roasted [[boar]], [[venison]], and [[grouse]], along with various forest vegetables.
*[[Klarinthra Larntrout]] was an [[elf|elven]] maker of very strong morel and [[mint]] [[mushroom wine]] beloved by [[The Simbul]] of [[Aglarond]].{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220525002919/https://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_050607-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed May – Jul 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
